description: Block-Centered Flow Package - Legacy flow package that specifies hydraulic properties as transmissivity and vertical leakance

variables.name: COMMENT
variables.description: Optional comment lines at beginning of file.
variables.tooltip: Lines starting with '#' are treated as comments and ignored by MODFLOW.

variables.name: IBCFCB
variables.description: Unit number for cell-by-cell flow terms. 0=no output, >0=write to this unit.
variables.tooltip: If > 0, cell-by-cell flow terms are written to the specified unit number. If 0, no cell-by-cell output.

variables.name: HDRY
variables.description: Head assigned to dry cells. Must be distinguishable from valid heads.
variables.tooltip: Value of head written to output for cells that have gone dry. Common value: -1.0E+30.

variables.name: IWDFLG
variables.description: Wetting capability flag. 0=wetting inactive, nonzero=wetting active.
variables.tooltip: If nonzero, wetting capability is active and WETFCT, IWETIT, IHDWET are read.

variables.name: WETFCT
variables.description: Factor used to calculate head when a cell is wetted.
variables.tooltip: Used to compute the initial head at a newly wetted cell. Common value: 0.1. Only read if IWDFLG != 0.

variables.name: IWETIT
variables.description: Iteration interval for attempting to wet cells.
variables.tooltip: Wetting is attempted every IWETIT iterations. Common value: 1. Only read if IWDFLG != 0.

variables.name: IHDWET
variables.description: Flag controlling equation for initial head at wetted cells. 0=equation 5a, nonzero=equation 5b.
variables.tooltip: Selects which equation computes the initial head at a newly wetted cell. Only read if IWDFLG != 0.

variables.name: Ltype
variables.description: Combined layer type and interblock transmissivity code for each layer. 0=confined/harmonic, 1=unconfined/harmonic, 2=confined/T varies/harmonic, 3=confined/T varies/arithmetic.
variables.tooltip: One value per layer. 0=confined (T constant), 1=unconfined (T=K*saturated thickness), 2=confined (T varies with head, harmonic avg), 3=confined (T varies, arithmetic avg). Add 10 for upstream weighting.

variables.name: TRPY
variables.description: Ratio of transmissivity (or K) in the column direction to transmissivity (or K) in the row direction.
variables.tooltip: One value per layer. 1.0 means isotropic. Values < 1 indicate lower transmissivity in the column direction.

variables.name: TRAN
variables.description: Transmissivity along rows for each cell (L^2/T).
variables.tooltip: 2D array for confined layers. Read for layers where Ltype is 0 or 2.

variables.name: HY
variables.description: Hydraulic conductivity along rows (L/T) for unconfined or variable-transmissivity layers.
variables.tooltip: 2D array for layers where transmissivity varies with head. Read for layers where Ltype is 1 or 3.

datasets.condition: NLAY > 1, read for layers 1 to NLAY-1 (accounting for confining beds)

variables.name: VCONT
variables.description: Vertical hydraulic conductivity divided by thickness between layer centers (1/T).
variables.tooltip: 2D array. Vertical leakance between each pair of adjacent layers. Not read if LAYCBD flags indicate a confining bed between layers.

variables.name: SF1
variables.description: Primary storage coefficient. Confined=specific storage * thickness. Unconfined=specific yield.
variables.tooltip: 2D array for each layer. For confined layers (Ltype 0,2): storage coefficient (Ss * b). For unconfined (Ltype 1,3): specific yield.

variables.name: SF2
variables.description: Secondary storage coefficient (specific yield) for convertible layers.
variables.tooltip: 2D array for layers that can convert between confined and unconfined. Used when the layer becomes unconfined.

variables.name: WETDRY
variables.description: Wetting threshold and flag. |WETDRY| is threshold. Positive=wet from below only, negative=wet from below and horizontally.
variables.tooltip: 2D array for wettable layers. Absolute value is the head threshold for wetting. Sign controls wetting direction.
